product_name: Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus Battery Pack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus battery pack cranks out 1 amp of power, letting you charge your personal devices while you're away from home. Battery pack stores enough power to recharge your device up to 3 times per charge. Works with AA and AAA rechargeable batteries (comes with 4 AA batteries); AAA batteries require an adapter, which is included with Goal Zero AAA batteries. Built-in LED flashlight runs 20+ hrs. per charge. The Goal Zero Guide 10 battery pack can be charged via a Goal Zero solar panel (sold separately) or a USB from a wall outlet or computer. Closeout.
short_description: The Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus battery pack cranks out 1 amp of power, letting you charge your personal devices while you're away from home.
